name: The Circles of Purrgatory
description:
Welcome to your first day at your new job in Purrgatory, aka cat hell!

As a standard desk-worker, you'll be dealing with paperwork of course! Read the "applications" for new arrivals and assign them to their own specially catered Circle of Purrgatory.

The Circles are:

  1. Limbo: For cats who unfortunately never had an owner in their lifetime.
  2. Needy: For those who were always meowing for attention and never-ending pets.
  3. Gourmand: Picky-eaters and gluttons alike will be whisked away here.
  4. Mean: Bad cats who liked to fight and be aggressive will finaly have their appetite satiated here.
  5. Disloyal: One of the worst things a cat can be.

Careful to read in detail the forms before submiting them. You wouldn't want to be sent to your own Circle of Purrgatory, now would you?

Controls:

  • Left Click and Hold in Grab mode to drag forms around
  • Left Click in Pen mode to fill in checkboxes
  • Right Click to switch between Pen and Grab mode
  • Escape to pause
  • Once you have filled the form, drop it off your desk to validate it

This game was made during the 48th Ludum Dare Compo with the theme : "Deeper and deeper".
